Name: Zoning, 14-10 Beach Channel Drive Rezoning, Queens (C 240079 ZMQ).
Title: Application number C 240079 ZMQ (14-10 Beach Channel Drive Rezoning) submitted by 14-10 Beach LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 25b, changing from an R5 District to an R6A district and establishing within the proposed R6A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Queens, Community District 14, Council District 31.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
